seniority_level.evidence: 3-5 years experience required, $80-85k salary range, responsibilities focus on implementation rather than leadership

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer', core responsibilities involve data pipelines and data ingestion

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on SFTP file transfers, file monitoring, data validation, and scheduled batch processing tasks

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of managing people, mentoring, or technical leadership responsibilities

primary_cloud.evidence: Azure Cloud explicitly mentioned as required experience, multiple Azure references in job description

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS and GCP mentioned as nice-to-have skills, indicating secondary cloud experience valued

processing_paradigm.evidence: SFTP transfers, file monitoring, scheduled tasks, and batch data processing focus throughout description

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned (Airflow, Spark, dbt, etc.), only general scripting and automation

storage_layer.evidence: No specific data warehouse, lake, or storage systems mentioned, focus is on file transfer mechanisms

remote_restriction.evidence: No work model specified (remote, hybrid, on-site), location given as Cincinnati OH but no restrictions stated

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone requirements mentioned, location in Cincinnati OH but no timezone overlap requirements

relocation_required.evidence: No relocation mentioned, position based in Cincinnati OH with no 'must relocate' or relocation package references

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship explicitly not mentioned in job posting, standard practice is to mention if available

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No student visa support mentioned, standard position requirements suggest work authorization required

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirement mentioned, standard US position requiring work authorization

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position with salary range indicates W2 employment structure

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or other compensation details mentioned in job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career growth, advancement opportunities, or promotion paths mentioned in job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs, working with senior staff, or collaborative learning environment mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression opportunities mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No IC track, management track, specialist track, or architect track mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Long list of must-have skills, specific 3-5 year experience requirement, Bachelor's degree required, multiple technical requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description on SFTP data engineering, well-defined responsibilities, single clear role scope

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 3-5 years experience for mid-level role is reasonable, skills listed are appropriate for SFTP data engineering position
